name: Sorano
description:
Game:

Sorano is an adventure game in rpg style.

Become a powerful knight who will protect your kingdom from terrible monsters.

Participate in the Great Championship of Sorano to become the most powerful knight of your kingdom.

Defeat Nithe, the terrible dragon that ravages the kingdom of Sorano.

And help your elf friend to be able to live freely in this kingdom.

This game is for you who love adventure and medieval style.

I'll leave my e-mail for suggestions: nami29708@gmail.com.
